title: where is sandbox/training mode in the new client

replies.body:
Short answer, not out yet.

It'll be out sometime in preseason, but there are other things that are a priority as far as making sure they work are concerned for a little while (ranked queues).
It says its out when you go into the old client and press opgrade to new client. Then it says the following: "Sandbox mode able in new client Out now." Something like that... Where is it tho?
